what i have done here i have put some
of the older tune's cut with jah root's
so you get a insight in where josh started
and i have also included some new material
that is gonna be on the offical release of his solo 
album "Things Change" and also bonus 
interview and acoustic version's along with
studio version's. i hope you realy digg this
just as much as i do and at same time help
josh gather bigger audience threw www.
